jobs.title: Software Engineer - B
jobs.description:
Your Role 


Develop and maintain SPFx components aligned with client UI/branding standards.


Design and implement intranet portals using SharePoint Online Modern Architecture.

Your Profile 


46 years of experience as a SharePoint Developer.


Strong expertise in SPFx component development and customization.


Skilled in using Fluent UI, Font Awesome, and similar icon libraries.


Hands-on experience with PnP Provisioning, PnP PowerShell, REST & Graph API.


Proven ability to deliver enterprise intranet portals and solutions in Agile setups.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description:
Job Description:

Job Description Senior Software Engineer Lead (Frontend/DCF 30)

About Company: Talent source team to write this.

Job Summary:

The purpose of this role is to provide technical guidance and suggest improvements in development processes. Develop required software features, achieving timely delivery in compliance with the performance and quality standards of the company.

Job Responsibilities:

Participates in the entire software development cycle - requirements analysis, design and development, unit testing and documentation.
Responsible for long-term code reusability and stability
Proactively identifies security, usability etc issues and formulates strategies to resolve them.
Works independently, without guidance, with broader overview on the project
Takes ownership of the delivery of complex application features and resolves key technical issues related to the assigned project.
Complies with estimation process and is responsible for accurate personal estimates.
Develops required software features, achieving timely and quality delivery.
Delivers training and participates in knowledge sharing.
Mentors new software engineers in the team
Integrates recent technologies.
Understands and follows the release processes in the company.

Job Requirements

Must Have:

Minimum 4 to 6 years of experience
Strong expertise on React.
Experience in leading code reviews.
Exposure to RESTful Webservices.
Demonstrate understanding of SOLID principles.
Demonstrate understanding of TDD or BDD.
Good knowledge and experience of writing good unit tests.
Experience working with cloud (AWS)
Use of tools such as JIRA, Git, GitHub
Strong communication skills
Ability to lead discussion and solve problems for the dev team
Provide guidance on inline technical documentation

Good to have:

Experience in Python/FastAPI.
Experience with Serverless.

Location:

DGS India - Mumbai - Thane Ashar IT Park

Brand:

Merkle

Time Type:

Full time

Contract Type:

Permanent

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.location: Hybrid - Navi Mumbai, Pune, Mumbai (All Areas)
jobs.description:
Senior Software Engineer - Platform




Experience: 4 - 7 Years Exp

Salary : Competitive

Preferred Notice Period: Within 30 Days

Opportunity Type: Hybrid (Mumbai)

Placement Type: Permanent




(*Note: This is a requirement for one of Uplers' Clients)




Must have skills required :

Java OR Spring OR Hibernate, DevOps OR Kubernetes, Angular





Ripplehire (One of Uplers' Clients) is Looking for:
Senior Software Engineer - Platform who is passionate about their work, eager to learn and grow, and who is committed to delivering exceptional results. If you are a team player, with a positive attitude and a desire to make a difference, then we want to hear from you.




Role Overview Description
Senior Software Engineer - Platform
We are looking for a Platform-focused Senior Software Engineer with 4-6 years of experience who is passionate about building robust infrastructure for recruitment solutions. You'll be instrumental in creating the backbone systems that power our AI agents, transform recruitment workflows, and enable next-generation candidate experiences.
You will be deeply involved in creating infrastructure that processes millions of workflow messages from disparate external systems, orchestrating containerized applications, managing batch processing jobs, and optimizing cloud infrastructure. Your expertise in Kubernetes, cloud architecture, and infrastructure automation will be essential as we scale our platform globally.

Your code will have millions of eyeballs from 200 countries right from Azerbaijan to Australia and closer to home, you will help hire from Jhumritalaiya to Jammu.


Key Responsibilities

Design, implement, and maintain containerized applications using Kubernetes
Create and optimize batch processing systems for data-intensive operations
Architect and develop platform services that enable rapid development by other teams
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features
Implement security and data protection measures
Participate in code reviews and contribute to engineering best practices


Requirements

4-6 years of experience developing software on a Java/J2EE and relational database stack
Hands-on experience with Kubernetes deployment and management
Experience implementing and optimizing batch processing jobs
Proficiency with technologies like Spring, Hibernate, SQL, and REST
Ability to harness AI as an engineering assistant to improve productivity and code quality


Preferred Qualifications

Experience with frontend development - JavaScript frameworks like Backbone/Angular
Data science experience - fetching data from multiple sources, modeling, and extracting information with familiarity in tooling, processing, and deployment (MongoDB, Hadoop, Mahout, Neo4j, etc.)
Information security experience - OWASP Security principles and implementation


Our Tech Stack

Java, Spring, Hibernate, MySQL - RDS, MongoDB, Apache Solr, Spring Cloud, Kubernetes, Docker, S3, CloudFormation/Terraform, CI/CD pipelines, Angular 2, Backbone JS, Azure OpenAI. Our applications are hosted on AWS and GCP.


What We Value

Great attitude to ask questions, learn, and suggest process improvements
Meticulous attention to detail and ability to identify edge cases
Equal importance to planning, coding, code reviews, documentation, and testing
High motivation with fresh ideas and perspectives for infrastructure optimization
Good team player who enjoys collaborative problem-solving
Commitment to release cycles and deadlines
Open-minded approach to considering AI as a helpful engineering assistant


Join our innovative platform team and help build the infrastructure that powers the future of recruitment technology! Apply today to make a significant impact in how companies worldwide hire talent.

How to apply for this opportunity:

Easy 3-Step Process:
1. Click On Apply! And Register or log in on our portal

2. Upload updated Resume & Complete the Screening Form

3. Increase your chances to get shortlisted & meet the client for the Interview!




About Our Client:

Ripplehire is a recruitment SaaS for companies to identify correct candidates from employees' social networks and gamify the employee referral program with contests and referral bonus to engage employees in the recruitment process. Developed and managed by Trampoline Tech Private Limited. Recognized by InTech50 as one of the Top 50 innovative enterprise software companies coming out of India and; NHRD (HR Association) Staff Pick for the most innovative social recruiting tool in India. Used by 7 clients as of July 2014. It is a tool available on the subscription-based pricing model.

About Uplers:

Our goal is to make hiring and getting hired reliable, simple, and fast. Our role will be to help all our talents find and apply for relevant product and engineering job opportunities and progress in their career.

(Note: There are many more opportunities apart from this on the portal.)

So, if you are ready for a new challenge, a great work environment, and an opportunity to take your career to the next level, don't hesitate to apply today. We are waiting for you!

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description:
Key Responsibilities of the candidate include:

Data Modeling and Database Design:

They create and manage data models, schemas, and database structures to support analytical and operational needs. 

ETL Processes:

Data engineers develop and implement ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes to move data from different sources into data warehouses or data lakes. 

Data Quality and Governance:

They implement processes and systems to ensure data accuracy, consistency, and reliability. 

Collaboration and Communication:

Data engineers work closely with data scientists, analysts, and other stakeholders to understand their data needs and deliver solutions. 

Performance Optimization:

They optimize data processing and storage for efficiency and scalability. 

Data Security and Compliance:

Data engineers implement security measures to protect sensitive data and ensure compliance with relevant regulations. 

Building and Maintaining Data Pipelines:

Data engineers design, build, and maintain systems for collecting, processing, and storing data from various sources. 

Support:

Data fixes and support infra provision for post go-live incidents and bug fixes.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description:
Backend Services Development: Design, implement, and maintain backend services using Node.js, focusing on efficiency, scalability, and integration with other software components.
API Development and Documentation: Develop robust APIs and maintain thorough documentation to ensure easy integration and high scalability.
Database Management: Utilize advanced skills in SQL and NoSQL databases to manage, optimize, and ensure the security of data.
Containerization and Orchestration: Deploy and orchestrate containerized applications using Docker and Kubernetes to enhance deployment processes and scalability.
Performance Optimization: Monitor, optimize, and ensure the robust performance of backend services.
Collaborative Development: Work alongside other developers, DevOps engineers, and project managers to ensure seamless integration of backend services with front-end platforms and other system components.
Infrastructure as Code (IaC): Utilize Terraform and Helm to manage cloud infrastructure, ensuring scalable and efficient deployment environments.
Cloud Deployment & CI Management: Work with GCP / AWS / Azure for deploying and managing applications in the cloud. Oversee continuous software integration processes including tests writing and artifacts building.


Qualifications
Education: Bachelor s/masters degree in computer science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
Experience: Minimum of 2+ years in backend development, with significant experience in TypeScript and JavaScript (Node.js).
Skills:
Deep understanding of Node.js and frameworks such as Express.js.
Strong proficiency in developing and managing APIs.
Experience with TypeScript and modern JavaScript features.
Knowledge in managing both SQL (e.g., PostgreSQL) and NoSQL (e.g., MongoDB) databases.
Familiarity with Docker, Kubernetes, and creating CI/CD pipelines is preferred but not mandatory.
Proficiency with GIT, including knowledge of GitHub and GitLab, is also desirable.
Ability to work collaboratively in a cross-functional team.

jobs.title: Google Big Query - Software Engineer
jobs.description:
Google Big Query

Description: Be a part of our success story. Launch offers talented and motivated people the opportunity to do the best work of their lives in a dynamic and growing company. Through competitive salaries, outstanding benefits, internal advancement opportunities, and recognized community involvement, you will have the chance to create a career you can be proud of. Your new trajectory starts here at Launch.

What are we looking for: The selected contractor will serve as an Application Developer focused on leveraging Google BigQuery for high-impact data processing and analytics solutions. The role is integral to supporting business-critical applications and driving data-driven decision-making within the organisation. The contractor will participate in designing, developing, testing, and deploying scalable data solutions, collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver robust business outcomes




Role: Google Big Query

Location: Mumbai

Experience: 3+ Years of Experience

Skill: Google Big Query, Data engineer , Python




Roles & Responsibilities:

Develop and optimise data pipelines, queries, and ETL processes using Google BigQuery
Collaborate with data analysts, business stakeholders, and other developers to deliver end-to-end data solutions
Support troubleshooting, performance tuning, and best practices for data warehousing
Document technical specifications, solutions, and processes for future reference
Adhere to project timelines and participate in regular progress reviews

Professional & Technical Skills

Design, build, and maintain scalable and high-performance BigQuery data models and pipelines
Work with large datasets, ensuring data accuracy, consistency, and security
Develop and maintain automated ETL jobs and scripts
Collaborate with software engineers, testers, and business analysts for requirement gathering and implementation
Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback
Prepare technical documentation and user guides as required
Ensure compliance with data governance and privacy policies
Troubleshoot and resolve production issues related to BigQuery and data workflows

Must-Have Skills:

Strong proficiency in Google BigQuery
Hands-on experience with SQL for complex data manipulation and analysis
Experience in building and optimising ETL pipelines
Proficiency in at least one programming language (e.g., Python, Java, or equivalent)
Familiarity with cloud platforms, especially Google Cloud Platform (GCP)

Good-to-Have Skills:

Experience with data visualisation tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI, Google Data Studio)
Knowledge of data warehousing concepts and best practices
Exposure to DevOps practices and tools
Understanding of data security and regulatory compliance in India

Experience Requirements:

Minimum 3 years of relevant hands-on experience in data engineering or application development roles, with at least 2 years using Google BigQuery

Additional Information

Candidate should be ready for Shift B and must be able to work as an individual contributor.
Google BigQuery is a must-have skill for this position.



We are Navigators in the Age of Transformation: We use sophisticated technology to transform clients into the digital age, but our top priority is our positive impact on human experience. We ease anxiety and fear around digital transformation and replace it with opportunity. Launch IT is an equal opportunity employer and considers applicants for all positions without regard to race, color, religion or belief, sex, age, national origin, citizenship status, marital status, military/veteran status, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity, physical or mental disability or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws. Launch IT is committed to creating a dynamic work environment that values diversity and inclusion, respect and integrity, customer focus, and innovation.

About Company: About Launch IT Launch IT India is wholly owned subsidiary of The Planet Group (http://www.launchcg.com; http://theplanetgroup.com) a US company, offers attractive compensation and work environment for the prospective employees. Launch is an entrepreneurial business and technology consultancy. We help businesses and people navigate from current state to future state. Technology, tenacity, and creativity fuel our solutions with offices in Bellevue, Sacramento, Dallas, San Francisco, Hyderabad & Washington D.C. https://www.linkedin.com/company/launch-consulting-group- india/

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description:
Software Engineer

The Team

Morningstar DBRS is a leading provider of independent rating services and opinions for corporate and sovereign entities, financial institutions, and project and structured finance instruments globally. Rating more than 4,000 issuers and 60,000 securities, we are one of the top four credit rating agencies in the world and a market leader in Canada, the U.S. and Europe in multiple asset classes. Morningstar DBRS empowers investor success by bringing more transparency and a much-needed diversity of opinion in the credit rating industry. Our approach and size allow us to be nimble enough to respond to customers' needs in their local markets, but large enough to provide the necessary expertise and resources they require. Market innovators choose to work with us because of our agility, tech-forward approach, and exceptional customer service.

The Role

The Software Engineer will work closely with cross functional teams, QA teams and other development teams to ensure timely and high-quality delivery. Will have to coordinate and work with the members in a global team in an Agile way. We are looking for an individual that can apply discipline, create solid software products and be accountable for deliverables.

Responsibilities

Create, develop and maintain the software code base of Credit products working in an agile environment.
Work with end users & work towards defect fixing
Analyze and review system requirements. User requirement and other design documents to gain overall understanding of the functionality of the new or enhanced application.
Participate actively in the building phases, aiming at producing high quality deliverables.
Provide recommendations on product and development environment improvements.

Requirements

Software developer with a total of 2+ years’ experience.
A Minimum of 2 years of development experience in Angular or VueJS or any js framework is required & there should be willingness to get cross trained must have.
A minimum of 2 years of backend development experience in python or .net is required & willingness to get cross trained must have.
Python based full stack development using FAST API, dependency management & debugging knowledge on cloud infrastructure good to have.
Excellent debugging knowledge is required.
Understanding DevOps processes is good to have.
Understanding of Harness/Jenkins as CI/CD tool is good to have
Good written and verbal communication skills are good to have
Good understanding of Source Control tools preferably Git is good to have
Experience of working in agile software development is required
A bachelor’s degree in computer science or an engineering field is strongly preferred

Morningstar is an equal opportunity employer.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description:
HPS has been developing an application for Customers Master Data Management, that is today used in Ceramics Business Unit (with 29000 customers), and that will be rolled out in 2024 on 2 additional Business Units : Construction Chemicals and LifeSciences.

We are looking for a motivated and rigorous Data Steward, to perform data preparation for CMDM implementations and functional administration of CMDM in run mode.

This role requires xxxxx

As a Data Steward for the Customers Master Data Management application, your role involves ensuring the accuracy, consistency, and security of customer data. Responsibilities include data quality monitoring, resolving data issues, collaborating with stakeholders, and implementing data governance policies to maintain high-quality customer information. You'll also play a key role in data integration, compliance with regulatory requirements, and continuous improvement of data management processes. Strong communication skills and attention to detail are essential for success in this position.

Key Activities:

Data Preparation : From ERP extractions for new sites, standardize the customers data, perform data quality controls and identify potential duplicates. Once this preparation work done, interact with local data owners to ensure accurate and consistent data to upload in CMDM.
Users Issues Solving : Work closely with users to understand their issues, propose solutions to solve them and implement data changes.
Data Quality Monitoring and Actions : Regularly perform data quality controls, and implement actions if results are below expectations (organize reviews, improve data quality thanks to external sources, perform additional trainings to users, propose application evolutions, ).

Profile:

Ability to rigorously follow procedures, especially on data preparation.
Strong skills in Excel.
Ability to communicate and interact, in English, with users from different countries and cultures.
Strong orientation towards users satisfaction.
Autonomy and self-motivation.

Qualifications:

Bachelor's degree in a relevant field; advanced degree preferred.
Proven experience in data management or business intelligence.
Excellent organizational and communication skills.

jobs.title: Software Engineer (Fresher)
jobs.description:
Why RE-ARCK

Learn and build: guided onboarding and structured training, then real project work

Mentorship from experienced engineers and architects

Career growth across backend, frontend, integration, data, testing/automation, and DevOps

Modern stack exposure: Java/Spring, REST APIs, JavaScript/TypeScript, SQL databases, cloud fundamentals, Git, CI/CD, Agile

AI training path: applied AI (LLMs, vector databases, retrieval, orchestration frameworks, agentic AI) to grow into a full-stack AI engineer

Inclusive, collaborative culture


What you will do

Design, code, test, and maintain software components and services

Write clean, maintainable code and unit tests; participate in code reviews

Work in Agile teams to deliver features end to end

Troubleshoot issues, optimize performance, and document solutions

Keep learning through structured training, pair programming, and on-the-job experience


Who should apply

Fresh Engineering graduates in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, or Information Technology (B.E./B.Tech or equivalent)

Early-career candidates with less than 4 years of total experience

Must-have skills: Java, JavaScript, SQL

Strong fundamentals in Data Structures and Algorithms, OOP, databases, and web basics (HTML/CSS/JS)

Familiarity with Git; problem-solving mindset; clear communication


Nice to have

Python, FastAPI, Spring/Spring Boot, Node.js/React, REST/JSON, Postman

Basics of cloud (AWS/Azure/GCP), Docker, CI/CD, or test automation

Academic projects, internships, hackathons, or open-source contributions


What we offer

Structured training with hands-on labs and real scenarios

Mentorship and regular feedback to accelerate growth

Exposure to enterprise-grade engineering and modern practices

Competitive compensation and a learning-first culture


Hiring process

Online assessment (core programming and problem solving)

Technical discussion (coding fundamentals, projects, SQL/Java/JS)

Culture and fit conversation

Offer and onboarding with training kick-off


Compensation

Fresher CTC: INR 4.25 LPA


Location

India (work mode may vary by project: on-site/hybrid/remote)

jobs.title: Software Engineer-9430
jobs.description:
Position: Software Engineer
positions: 1
No.of
About Company:
Headquartered in El Segundo, Calif., Internet Brands is a fully integrated online media and
software services organization focused on four high-value vertical categories: Health,
Automotive, Legal, and Home/Travel. The company's award-winning consumer websites
lead their categories and serve more than 250 million monthly visitors, while a full range of
web presence offerings has established deep, long-term relationships with SMB and
enterprise clients. Internet Brands' powerful, proprietary operating platform provides the
flexibility and scalability to fuel the company's continued growth. Internet Brands is a portfolio
company of KKR and Temasek.
WebMD Health Corp., an Internet Brands Company, is the leading provider of health
information services, serving patients, physicians, health care professionals, employers, and
health plans through our public and private online portals, mobile platforms, and health-
focused publications. The WebMD Health Network includes WebMD Health, Medscape,
Jobson Healthcare Information, prIME Oncology, MediQuality, Frontline, QxMD, Vitals
Consumer Services, MedicineNet, eMedicineHealth, RxList, OnHealth, Medscape
Education, and other owned WebMD sites. WebMD, Medscape, CME Circle,
Medpulse®, eMedicine®, MedicineNet®, theheart.org®, and RxList® are among the
trademarks of WebMD Health Corp. or its subsidiaries.
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race,
color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or veteran
status.
For Company details, visit our website: www.webmd.com and www.internetbrands.com
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to
race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability,
or veteran status.
For Company details, visit our website: www.webmd.com
https://www.webmd.com/corporate/physicians-interactive


Education: Tech/B.E. / MSc Statistics
Experience: 3+ years
Work Timings: 2:00 PM to 11:00 PM IST


Position Requirements:

2+ years of experience using Data Integration Tools - Pentaho or any other ETL
/ ELT tools
2+ years of experience using traditional databases like Postgress, MSSQL,
Oracle
1+ years of experience using Columnar databases like Vertica, Google,
BigQuery, Amazon Redshift
1+ years of experience in Scheduler/ Orchestration Tools like Control-M,
Autosys, Airflow, JAMS

Good conceptual knowledge on ETL/ ELT strategies
Good conceptual knowledge in any code Versioning Tools
Good collaboration, communication and documentation skills
Experience of working in Agile Delivery model
Requires minimal or no direct supervision

Good knowledge in Data Visualization Tools like Tableau, Pentaho BA tools
Digital marketing/ Web Analytics or BI is a plus
Knowledge of scripting languages such as Python is good to have
Experience in Linux environment is preferred but not mandatory
Role & Responsibilities:
Develop and support multiple Data Engineering projects with heterogenous
data sources, produce/ consume data to/from messaging queues like Kafka,
push/ pull data to/from REST APIs

Support in-house build Data integration Framework, Data Replication
Framework, Data Profiling & Reconciliation Framework
Develop data Pipelines with good coding standards, unit testing with detailed
test cases
Willingness to learn new technologies.
